headline: Newmont (NEM) Valuation Check As Gold Rebound And Fed Cut Hopes Lift Investor Optimism
summary: Newmont (NEM) is back in focus after a rebound in gold prices, supported by renewed expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts that have lifted sentiment toward gold miners and inflation hedging assets. See our latest analysis for Newmont. At a share price of $116.85, Newmont has recently swung between sharp pullbacks and strong rebounds, with a 7 day share price return of 11.44% decline set against a 30 day gain of 12.87%, a 90 day rise of 41.58% and a 1 year total shareholder return of...

headline: Barrick Aims for IPO of North American Gold Assets This Year
summary: Barrick Mining is pushing ahead with plans to separate its North American gold operations into a separately listed company in which it plans to retain a controlling stake.

headline: Newmont (NEM) Is Down 11.4% After Gold Volatility And Earnings Jitters - What's Changed
summary: In recent days, Newmont has been at the center of sharp swings in gold-linked equities as bullion prices rebounded and futures margin requirements shifted, while investors looked ahead to its Q4 and full-year 2025 results scheduled for 19 February 2026. Beyond gold price volatility, the market is weighing Newmont’s integration of Newcrest assets, cost control efforts, and portfolio optimization plans as it seeks stronger free cash flow and a tighter focus on core operations. With the stock...
